name: Interstellar (Lucasohlmann)
description: Coming from the Space blaster project, and other than rearranging maps and putting in a couple of environmental skins, I've put in a handful of modifications to the game. The first mod being the aesthetics of the game visually, as well astroid walls that are destructible. I also included bosses within levels 2 and 3 which have more health as well as their lasers doing more damage. Lastly, I've changed the music for every level. Hope everyone enjoys! Any feed back is incredibly helpful.
